data.name: Maximize travelled distance
data.description:
# Story

A dishonest manager of a transportation company has a deal with a fuel supplier, and is interested in its maximum consumption. There are `N` cities located at equal distance from each other along a linear road. Help him plan such route that maximizes the overall travelled distance.

___

## Input

* Number of cities

## Output

* Maximum distance that can be travelled

___

## Visual example

A map with 5 cities:

```
City #1        City #2        City #3        City #4        City #5
V              V              V              V              V
█______________█______________█______________█______________█
  <- 1 unit ->   <- 1 unit ->   <- 1 unit ->   <- 1 unit ->
```

___

## Notes

* The distance between any two neighboring cities is `1 unit`.
* The driver always starts in one of the cities.
* The driver can start in any of the cities.

```if:c,cpp
Big input values will be tested. Using an incorrect approach will lead to overflowing the output data type.
```
